dialogueText: Hey you!

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: ...you can call me Dr. Zero. I've just traveled from my planet Aeoien to come here to your world Earth!

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: What's your name?

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: Nice to meet you, _. I am really impressed with the speed at which humans learn language.

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: My company, the ICRC (Interplanetary Communications Research Company) aims at creating a machine that can efficiently replicate this language learning ability.

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: We've already developed a harmless chip that can monitor brain activity.

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: We would like to hire a human to help us study the memorization process.

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: You're the first one I've bumped into so you have to help! All you have to do is learn a foreign language!

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: Would you like to help us with our research?
choices: Sure, if I get paid well.

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: Great! You're officially employed now. Let me give you your researcher identification tag!

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: Ah, 115 is a good number for our new great employee! So, what language would you like to learn?

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: Let's get started then! Here's our company's specially developed communication device the TC V21!

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: This device will hold all of your work material and help you communicate with me and all of your other colleagues!

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: This first app holds all of the study material you need to memorize!

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: Here I'll add my information now into your contact book!

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: If I don't see you in person I'll send out some periodic reminders through the messaging app to check back in with you to see how you're doing.

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: No problem _! We've set up waypoint connection points around your area so when you have everything memorized come to us so we can analyze your data.

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: To save us traveling energy, we all have holographic transfers of ourselves- but it'll be like we're actually here!

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: The camera on the TC will be able to see us. Currently #008 and #114 also have holographic transfers on Earth right now!

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: Go walk around and meet then! According to your earthling studies, walking while memorizing enhances retainment!

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: Yeah we've checked it with many human studies. Anyways, Here's your first set of words!

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: I've updated your vocabulary app. When you're ready, walk to the waypoint where I'm located and hold up the device to see us.

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: If you aren't able to complete this during working hours, you will be expected to work overtime.

speaker: DR. ZERO
dialogueText: Did I forget to mention that earlier? Don't worry, we will compensate you well. See you soon #115.
